item.title: Joint Bayesian inference of language and scene structure from captioned images
item.description:
Colin will present his recent work on inferring captions for scenes.

References

This work is still in development, but Colin has provided two sources that provide some background. The first is his previous paper from ICDL 2013:

A generative probabilistic framework for learning spatial language . Colin R. Dawson, Jeremy Wright, Antons Rebguns, Marco Valenzuela Escarcega, Daniel Fried and Paul R. Cohen.

The second is a related paper on probabilistic parsing by Michael Collins.

Three Generative, Lexicalised Models for Statistical Parsing. Michael Collins.

item.title: Discourse-aware Non-factoid Question Answering: Discourse Markers, Parsing, and Domain Transfer
item.description: Peter will present some recent work on NLP.
